note.p: Death: Shanklin, Isle of Wight (02 February 1903)
Education: University College, London; St John's College, Cambridge. BA (1850), MA
Career: Fellow of St John's College, Cambridge (1852-1860); Mathematical Tutor and Reader in Natural Philosophy, Durham (1855-1859); Mathematics Master, Harrow School (1859-1893)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 270-272 signed by W H B
References: Sir Brian Pippard, FRS, 'Schoolmaster-Fellows and the campaign for science education' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 63-81, plate
